pages.text: The $(item)Item Magnet$() is an invaluable tool for cleaning up litter and/or theft. When $(thing)Right-Clicked$(), it casts a ray that, through usage of it's inbuilt Ender Pearl, teleports all items in it vicinity to the user.
Mild caution is advised when using your item magnet - depleting its charge too far will cause its pickup range and recharge speed to drastically decrease for a while.
